fields.name: state
fields.title: Target Object State
fields.description: Represents the state of the object which is suitable for the specified process template.

fields.name: enabled
fields.title: Enabled
fields.description: Indicates whether this object state process is enabled or not.

fields.name: previousFilter
fields.title: Object Previous Filter
fields.description: A string which represents an filter which validates if an object meets the requirements for initializing the specified process template before data operation. This property is optional.

fields.name: filter
fields.title: Object Filter
fields.description: A string which represents an filter which validates if an object meets the requirements for initializing the specified process template. This property is optional.

fields.name: singleInstance
fields.title: Single Instance
fields.description: A boolean which indicates whether this object state process is olny allowed if no other process of the same type is still running.

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: A string which represents the title of the item.

fields.name: model
fields.title: Target Model
fields.description: Represents the model which is going to be associated with the specified process template.

fields.name: template
fields.title: Business Process Template
fields.description: The business process template associated with this item.

constraints.description: Only one process template is permitted for a model and a specific object state.
